Reviews.Title: Good Quality Cables - great price
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: I ordered these for a new wired security camera system that I purchased and these cables are working as well as the cables that came with my system.

ProductInfo.Features:
All-in-one video and power cable
Plug and Play ready, For camera with DC power only
Video/Power cable has BNC connectors and includes 2 RCA/BNC adapters
150 feet video/power cables in black
BNC video & 2.1mm power connectors
ProductInfo.Name: ATC black 2 PACK 150ft Video Power Extension Cable Wire for CCTV DVR CCD Security Cameras Surveillance System with BNC to RCA Adaptor
